*Hotel Security Issues*

I am highly doubtful about the security level of this hotel which does not live up to my expectation of a five-star hotel.

Two weeks ago, my colleagues and I worked in the ballroom for photography and videography. His equipment, including the expensive lenses, were stolen. He spotted the thief and chased after him but in vain. He reported this to the hotel staff, but to his appointment, the hotel did not assist and it appeared to us that they did not care. We were not sure if this hotel venue has been a popular place for stealing. It was the indifference and no offer of help that concern me the most. Maybe this hotel is a hot spot for event thefts.

Imagine you are an event participant, there is a high chance that your personal belongings could be stolen but the hotel just would not care; imagine you are an event organizer, or an exhibitor, your assets will be at high risks as it is likely that event thieves may target you and your valuables as they knew there would be no consequences.

Think twice if you are considering booking this venue for business or a personal vacation. I have lost my trust in them. I hope you don’t need to go through the loss or disappointment like we did.

If you are ever thinking of holding a conference here then think again. This hotel takes no accountability of lost property. Security and staff do not care as long as they are making money. They were no help at all when my equipment got stolen in an area where our meeting was being held. They were no help even when I was completely distraught and asked to see their CCTV. Don't trust what they say, they will not help you.
Excelente Hotel,  habitaciones y atención todo impecable, el lugar donde está ubicado, super recomendable
reviews.textTranslated: Excellent Hotel, rooms and attention all impeccable, the place where it is located, highly recommended

reviews.text:
Upon arriving at the hotel, I was immediately impressed by its proximity to the airport. It's a perfect choice for travelers with early morning or late-night flights. The convenience of being able to reach quickly and easily was a major plus.

The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and the staff at the reception were welcoming and accommodating. They provided all the necessary information about the hotel's facilities and services.

The room itself was comfortable and well-appointed. It was clean, and the bed was cozy, which made for a restful night's sleep. The soundproofing was effective, considering the proximity to the airport, as I wasn't disturbed by any noise from outside.

I also appreciated the in-room amenities, including a coffee maker and a well-stocked bathroom with toiletries. These little touches made the stay even more comfortable.

For dinner, I dined at the hotel's restaurant and was pleased with the quality of the food and the variety of options available. The breakfast buffet offered a good selection, ensuring a hearty start to the day.

The hotel's shuttle service to and from the airport was punctual and convenient, making it easy to catch my flight without any stress.

Overall, my one-night was exactly what I needed for a seamless stopover near to the location.The combination of comfort, convenience, and friendly service made it a great choice, especially for travelers with tight schedules. I would definitely consider staying here again in the future.
Our stay was very nice and comfortable and the staff were amazing and very helpful. Especially Vyan, she was very kind and helpful always smiling and cheerful, made our stay memorable!
Everything was very nice, the room, the staff, and the restaurant.  Highly recommended.

من ااجمل فنادق🏢لندن خدمتهم روعه ومريحين وموقعه ممتاز كل شي حولك ، الغرفه واسعه واطلالتها روعه ، السرير مريح ، الموظفون 👨‍💼🧑‍💼متعاونيين جدا واي وقت تطلب شي يساعدونك يأخذون تأمين فيزا 100 باوند كاش 200 💷يستحق التجربه والتكرار بسبب تعاملهم الجميل🤝 .

One of the most beautiful hotels in London. Their service is wonderful, they are comfortable, and their location is excellent. Everything is around you. The room is spacious and has a wonderful view. The bed is comfortable. The staff is very cooperative. Anytime you ask for something, they help you. They take a Visa deposit of 100 pounds and cash of 200. It is worth trying and repeating because of their beautiful treatment.

reviews.text:
I would avoid this hotel at all costs, it is not safe and they do have adequate security. This is a scathing review, but I'm sure if you continue to read this review you will understand why. As a professional subcontractor employed to work at this hotel, while working at this hotel at a conference we had our equipment stolen, which totalled thousands of pounds.
The equipment was stolen from the actual conference room which was fully occupied at the time, and the conference was running. The thief made their way unchallenged into the hotel, pretending to be a delegate attending the conference and walked straight into the conference room during the conference and stole the equipment and walked out without being challenged by hotel security. The hotel security is completely lethargic and asleep on duty. They haven't been at all helpful with this incident, and were reluctant to even contact the police, the hotel is completely responsible and they failed in their duties to provide adequate security for the event. I am confident more thefts happened that day, but have gone unreported. We even asked for a safe place for storage of our bags/equipment and the hotel said they have good security and the room the conference was taking place was safe...
The conference attendees all had lanyards, but the hotel failed to provide adequate security to check and challenge appropriately like other hotels do.
My advice would be to find another hotel to hold your conference or meeting, be warned this hotel will ruin your conference or meeting as they have a dated approach to security, and how to protect their clients and customers. This is the sort of place where anything could happen as the staff are not doing what they should be. Overall, in my opinion the minimum wage staff are doing the minimum basics...
Poor management of what would be a great hotel, in a premium location.

This hotel is anything but five stars. My bathroom was falling apart (the soap tray was rickety and part of the temperature nozzle fell off), the staff was condescending and unhelpful in every regard, the food was overpriced and underwhelming, the gym was gross and sticky, they never put my card I used to pay earlier on file (so I had to use my emergency credit card to pay for in room dining because they would not budge to change their decision), and they would not help give me a refund at all when I wanted to leave after they couldn't find my guest reservation for half an hour, and I booked a new hotel somewhere else only for them to finally find my reservation but were unable to let me leave (even if it was not in their control, none of the staff seemed remotely interested in helping solve this issue at all). It is undeserving of a five star title to say the least.

I had such a very bad customer service experience at the Royal Garden Hotel, I thought it deserved a review (although I rarely post reviews in general). I stayed at the hotel for couple of nights in March and my coat was stolen when stored by the concierge in the hotel cloak room. The reception staff gave me an email address to send a claim which happened to be the wrong one. After at least 5 emails and couple of calls I have finally been given the email of the person in charge of the claims, the Director of Risk & Compliance. I have emailed this gentleman who did not reply. I have then called him few times and he was always very nice on the phone asking me to send an email again and he mentioned he would personally manage the claim process. However, he never replied to any of my emails. After over 6 months I have not even been able to get a response from the hotel. Although a bit disappointing to get my personal belongings stolen while kept by the hotel security team, I can understand. However, not even be able to provide a response to my very courteous request despite many attempts is definitely not acceptable, especially for a hotel advertised as "premium". This hotel may have gotten its stars thanks to the nice location, but definitely not  to its customer service. Definitely not recommend. Benjamin (Canada).

Absolutely loved our stay at this hotel! The location is perfect with easy access to great restaurants and the train...the rooms are very spacious and clean...housekeeping is on top of anything you ask for...theres a lil green hut just up the street with probably the best breakfast sandwich ive ever had...really the only complaint i had on this hotel was the woman at front desk "seemed" a lil rude but i dont think she was doing it on purpose..thats just the way she is 🤣🤷...highly highly recommend this hotel
The room was very nice and comfortable, but the location a bit far from tourist areas

I stayed in the hotel more than 4 times, but this time my experience was bad for two reasons. The first reason is that the wardrobe space of the new rooms that overlooked the garden was bad, not enough for a child. I had to upgrade to a suite due to the tightness. The second reason is that the behavior of the person carrying the bags, I think his name is Lious, was very bad and makes you feel uncomfortable. You feel like an unwanted guest
فندق ٥ نجوم ممتاز
reviews.textTranslated: An excellent 5 star hotel

reviews.text: The room were so comfortable, the service was very good & staff are very nice. However, I hope that they offer more reasonable prices.
Top service and aware to help.

I have been robbed in this hotel my personal bags got stolen from the concierge desk from inside the concierge room and no one even cared I have sent emails and they only reply that they are still investigating!! This is not acceptable at all and they never got back to me till now and I have completed more than a month now .. I don’t understand how this happened and how weak they are security wise !! I don’t recommend this hotel to anyone as they also are not professional neither have any care about their costumers and it’s a shame !!

Very nice property.

Highly recommended.

Mr Prashant Sawant at the reception was a great help in everything. He was patient and addressed all our queries properly.

If you are in Kensington, this is probably the best property to stay.

Edit: after initial issues with our stay the hotel went above and beyond to correct the issues and make our stay great. I highly recommend as it’s in a great area with a staff that clearly cares about its guests.
Staying at Royal garden is very satisfying, especially with the wonderful treatment and hospitality managed by Mr. Andria. Thank you very much.

Stayed at This hotel for 10 nights and i have no clue how its a 5 star ⭐️.

I really wanted to like this place  mostly because of its location but it is really difficult to like.
You are greeted with this dull short lobby with  reception desk people whom are as dull ,unfriendly and not keen to help with anything you could ask for.

The Internet is absolute trash and you cant use it for anything apart from browsing yet they know that but they‘re unapologetic about it.
The moody and agitated luggage guys  help you feel the tension in the air on your way to the elevators which they frequently use with us and can be bothersome.
The stagnant air in the corridors which turned smelly after couple of days which turned out because a pipe broke or something and water flooded a room and they had to leave the doors open so it would get some air.

The kitchen is somewhat a joke and has zero consistency .dont order the pancakes…

The housekeeping people were really wonderful in my experience. You gotta love them 😊

The valets are also VERY helpful and pleasant .

Overall the hotel asks for way more than it deserves nor provide its guests.

Only come here if you want easy access to the Kensington park, otherwise there are much better options near by.

The hotel was wonderful but I had a problem, they charged me every time I go to breakfast just keep in mind I paid for breakfast. Whenever I finish breakfast, they gave me a bill to pay. I paid for a breakfast buffet, and they gave me a service bill.
من أجمل واحلى الفنادق يستاهل ١٠٠ نجمه
reviews.textTranslated: One of the most beautiful and beautiful hotels that deserves 100 stars

reviews.text:
Great customer service , Serena was great and helpful ,friendly yet professional .
She dealt perfectly with few situations not only for us but also other guests .
A well recommended hotel for business travel and also for tourism.
Excellent hotel at very good value!
The hotel maintains in not as good as it used to be!

One of the worst experiences in a long time. My entire evening was wasted being provided false information by the concierge team while waiting for someone to fix the heating that was not working in my room.

A stay that was vastly more frustrating than enjoyable. I hope my experience was an outlier but I would not recommend the hotel.
地理位置非常优越，前面是闹市街后面正对公园，动静相宜，预定的花园房间风景美美晚上安静无比。楼下咖啡馆林立、世界各地美食汇聚、服装品牌以应具有，美国的食品超市Whole Food就在酒店对面，太方便了。可以步行去海得、白金汉宫等地，价格400美金出头，很值得！
reviews.textTranslated: The location is very advantageous, with the busy street in front and the park facing the back, which is suitable for both movement and quiet. The garden room booked has beautiful scenery and is extremely quiet at night. There are many cafes downstairs, food from all over the world gathers, and clothing brands are available. The American food supermarket Whole Food is right opposite the hotel, which is so convenient. You can walk to Hyde, Buckingham Palace and other places, and the price is just over 400 US dollars, which is very worth it!

reviews.text: Lovely hotel with friendly, helpful and polite staff. Rooms over the park have the most amazing views across London. Would definitely stay again.

A nice family place with a pool side. We enjoyed the food and the location is great - easy access to the beach and sea.

The staff are friendly and we had a great time.
Amazing location

Our stay was very pleasant. This was mainly due to an incredible receptionist Vivian who took care of us and treated us like family. We cannot show our appreciation enough. She is an incredible employee and made our review five stars. Would greatly recommend this place. Right along the Kensington palace. Short walk to the nearest tube station.
Positive: Comfortable, clean, and quiet hotel in a great location.

I really liked the rooms they were very clean and bright. The reception staff was professional and helpful. Is a great location and I definitely recommend it.
I don’t recommend to have breakfast included, it is not worth it. If you stay many days better have breakfast anywhere outside the hotel, as the breakfast is every day the same.
Friendly, very clean and easy access to bus and tube. Great views of Kensington Park. Highly recommend!
Positive: Friendly staff, very clean room and great views! Negative: No
Great location and the area safe

The hotel is well located on Kensington High Street next to Kensington Palace Gardens. 5 mins walk to High Street Kensington underground station and a short distance to all local attractions.
Very nice room, great views and comfortable.

A Disheartening Experience at Royal Garden Hotel: Staff Attitude and Theft Issues

Rating: ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)

My recent stay at the Royal Garden Hotel was a profoundly disappointing experience marred by abysmal staff behavior and alarming theft incidents. From the moment I stepped foot into the premises, it became evident that this establishment lacks the fundamental principles of hospitality and integrity.

The staff at the Royal Garden Hotel could not have been more discourteous and unhelpful if they had tried. It was as though they had been trained to avoid eye contact and ignore guest requests. Simple queries were met with dismissive shrugs and sighs, leaving me feeling like an unwanted burden rather than a paying guest. The lack of basic manners and a complete disregard for customer service was truly disheartening.

As if the dreadful staff attitude wasn't enough, the issue of theft within the hotel was deeply concerning. It became apparent that security and guest safety were not a priority for the Royal Garden Hotel. Valuables mysteriously vanished from my room, and when I reported the incident to the front desk, I was met with indifference and skepticism. It was evident that the staff had no intention of taking responsibility or even attempting to investigate the matter.

The feeling of violation and insecurity caused by these theft incidents completely overshadowed any semblance of comfort the hotel might have provided. Trust is the cornerstone of any accommodation, and the Royal Garden Hotel's blatant disregard for the safety of its guests shattered that trust into a million pieces.

It's truly disheartening to witness such a prestigious-looking establishment fall so short of its promises. The negative experience I encountered at the Royal Garden Hotel is not one I would wish upon anyone. Until the management addresses the deplorable staff attitude and takes concrete measures to ensure the safety and security of their guests, I strongly advise travelers to steer clear of this establishment. There are countless other hotels that prioritize their guests' well-being and offer genuine hospitality, making the Royal Garden Hotel a regrettable choice for anyone seeking a pleasant and secure stay.

تجربة مخيبة في فندق رويال جاردن: سلوك العاملين وحوادث السرقة

التقييم: ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)

إقامتي الأخيرة في فندق رويال جاردن كانت تجربة مخيبة للآمال بسبب سوء سلوك الموظفين وحوادث السرقة المثيرة للقلق. منذ لحظة أن وضعت قدمي في المكان، أصبح واضحًا أن هذا المكان يفتقر إلى مبادئ الضيافة والنزاهة الأساسية.

لم يكن الموظفون في فندق رويال جاردن يمكن أن يكونوا أكثر تكبرًا وعدم مساعدة إذا ما حاولوا. كان الأمر وكأنهم تم تدريبهم على تجنب ملامسة العيون وتجاهل طلبات النزلاء. تلقت استفسارات بسيطة نظرات تجاهل وتنهيدات، مما جعلني أشعر كأنني عبء غير مرغوب فيه بدلاً من نزيل مدفوع الأجر. نقص الأخلاقيات البسيطة والاستهتار الكامل بخدمة العملاء كان حقًا محبطًا.

كما لو كان سوء سلوك الموظفين غير كافٍ، فإن مسألة السرقة داخل الفندق كانت مثيرة للقلق بشدة. أصبح واضحًا أن الأمان وسلامة النزلاء ليستا أولوية لفندق رويال جاردن. اختفت الأشياء الثمينة بشكل غامض من غرفتي، وعندما أبلغت الاستقبال بالحادث، واجهت تجاهلًا وشكوكًا. كان من الواضح أن الموظفين لم يكونوا لديهم نية لتحمل المسؤولية أو حتى محاولة التحقيق في المسألة.

الشعور بالانتهاك وعدم الأمان الذي تسببت فيه حوادث السرقة هذه قام بتحطيم أي طمأنينة قد يكون قدمها الفندق. الثقة هي ركيزة أي إقامة، واستهانة فندق رويال جاردن بسلامة نزلائه أدت إلى تفتيت تلك الثقة إلى مليون قطعة.

من المؤلم حقًا رؤية مؤسسة بمظهر مرموق تفشل لهذا الحد في وعودها. التجربة السلبية التي واجهتها في فندق رويال جاردن ليست تجربة أتمناها لأي شخص. حتى يتعامل الإدارة مع سلوك الموظفين المذموم ويتخذ إجراءات ملموسة لضمان سلامة وأمان ضيوفها، أنصح بشدة المسافرين بتجنب هذا المكان. هناك العديد من الفنادق الأخرى التي تولي أولوية لراحة ضيوفها وتقدم ضيافة حقيقية، مما يجعل فندق رويال جاردن خيارًا مأساويًا لمن يبحثون عن إقامة ممتعة وآمنة
